creator: don_sfw@dlaster.com
text:
A compiler error occurs in server/config.c at line 1602 with the #define
FNM_PERIOD if --with-apr is specified.

# Causes error with FNM_PERIOD in config.h and config.c at line 1602
# HTTPD_OPTS="${HTTPD_OPTS} --with-apr=/usr/local/apache2/bin/apr-1-config"
# HTTPD_OPTS="${HTTPD_OPTS} --with-apr-util=/usr/local/apache2/bin/apu-1-config"

Configuration scripts attached that are used to compile the code.

creator: don_sfw@dlaster.com
text:
Created attachment 14737
Script used to configure httpd 2.0.53

This is the script file used to configure httpd-2.0.53.  Using Slackware Linux
10.1 with gcc-3.3.4

Created attachment 14738
apr-1.1.1 configure script

This is the script file used to configure the apr software.  Using Slackware
Linux 10.1 with gcc-3.3.4

text:

configure script used with apr-util-1.1.2

Configure script used to compile apr-util (Slackware 10.1 - gcc 3.3.4)
creator: don_sfw@dlaster.com

text:
HTTPD 2.0.xx uses APR 0.9.x, not APR 1.x.x.  To use APR 1.x, you must use HTTPD
2.1.x.  Marking invalid, as you were attempting to use too new of a version with
HTTPD -- try using APR 0.9.6.
creator: chip@force-elite.com
